sentences.sContent: Genius is nothing but labor and diligence.
sentences.sContent_eng: Genius is nothing but labor and diligence.
sentences.sCn: 天才无非是工作和勤奋。

sentences.sContent: I know no such things as genius; it is nothing but labor and diligence.
sentences.sContent_eng: I know no such things as genius; it is nothing but labor and diligence.
sentences.sCn: 我不知道有天才这种东西；它只是劳动和勤奋的结果。

sentences.sContent: Honesty and diligence should be your permanent partner.
sentences.sContent_eng: Honesty and diligence should be your permanent partner.
sentences.sCn: 诚实和勤勉，应该成为你永久的伴侣。

remMethod.val: dili(音似： 地里)＋gence → 每天在地里劳作 → 勤勉

words.tran: 勤勉的；用功的，费尽心血的
